mapper.insert: insert into points values(POINT_SEQ.nextval, sysdate, ( select -sum(point_change) from users u LEFT OUTER JOIN points p ON u.user_num = p.user_num where 1 = 1 and u.user_num = #{userNum} ), #{pointContent}, #{userNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.*, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1)/#{limit} + 1) page FROM (SELECT * FROM points where user_num = #{searchType.userNum} ORDER BY points.USER_NUM DESC) m ) WHERE page = #{nowPage}
